bibl.title: Tribunus equitum singularum? Two Fragmentary Inscriptions Concerning Egyptian Legionary Prefects.
bibl.note: Remplace: ZPE 78 (1989) pp. 185-195 ("bibliographisch zu ignorieren"), issu d'épreuves non corrigées. - C.I.L. XIV, 191 + 4471 = A.E. 1971, 65, from Ostia. - C.I.L. VI, 31871 = C.I.L. XIV, *289 (c), from Rome.
Blommaert D.C., Tribunus equitum singularum? Two Fragmentary Inscriptions Concerning Egyptian Legionary Prefects.
